website_summaries.verdict: The Striiv Play activity tracker makes fitness fun, with a reward and challenge system. But it seems geared toward children, and both the device and the app lack polish compared with the competition.
pros: Logs steps taken, stairs climbed, calories burned, and more
Plenty of challenges and mini games
cons: No Android app or Web interface

customer_reviews.title: Technical difficulties are a deal breaker!!
customer_reviews.text: First, I had issues getting it to power on. Hint: You probably need to let it charge for a full day and then do the reset instructions a few times. charge some more and then reset some move. I love the MyLand that comes with this device. That's why I kept trying to get it to charge and power on. After using for a few weeks, the MyLand feature disappeared from the App!!! BIG DISAPPOINTMENT! Customer service is very friendly and is currently helping me with this. If they are not able to get the MyLand back on my app. (it only disappears when I pair Striiv Play) I'm returning and going back to use the ole' stand by FitBit!
customer_reviews.author: Jindahuse

customer_reviews.title: Sending it back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Striiv for a gift as it seems impressive enough and for a walker it is fun to track your walk but, it wouldn't sync to my phone nor would it count correctly. The computer I hooked it up to says it doesn't see the strive USB and after 3 days of trying to get it to sync, well, I just sent it back. On the other hand, I did buy the bigger Striiv and it works and sync great. The small Wireless one I would not buy again but, may purchase the bigger non-wireless model again to replace the gift for fathers day.
customer_reviews.author: RT2

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: For the price this pedometer is awesome. I absolutely love the charts and the fact that the app always sets new goals as you beat your previous record. My friends with a fitbit day say the big difference is that theirs tracks sleep...so if you want a cheaper option without that feature this is totally the way to go. Battery life is about two or three days but it's just a matter of remembering to plug it in. It's now fun if your friends gets one too for the competitions.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca David

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I had the app without striiv play for a month, loved the app but had to have phone with me at all times to track steps. I bought the Play on Amazon for half what it sells directly from Striiv. Every once in a while have to reset it or my phone but 95% of the time it works great and I am now logging between 6,000 and 11,000 steps per day when I used to do only about 3,000. The app really motivates me to keep going and I paired it with myFitnessPal and MyEveryMove and I lost 5 pounds this month.
customer_reviews.author: CityMominWoods

customer_reviews.title: Dead out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Totally dead out of the box. Never worked - never even came on. So disappointed. I should have paid more attention to the plethora of negative reviews, but those that were positive made this device sound like so much fun. I followed every trick and tip in the user guide and online - nothing. Intended to return it via Amazon but waited too long, shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gentle

customer_reviews.title: wish it would work with pc but awesome counter
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, works great, has a nice little interface. But unless you have an apple product to set it up the first time it won't set up on your pc. Once you set it up you can use your pc for all other aspects. Hope they change that. Very accurate in counting steps. I had the sonic boom pebble for work, tried three other systems before this one. They others glorified your steps, telling you that you walked 8 - 10 k steps in a mile. This one talks me 1800 - 2k. Much more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: JRS Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Received faulty product and customer service won't help.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for Christmas and it didn't work right straight out of the box. It was charged properly and the screen would light up, however once we tried to use it and press the buttons it would not do anything. Contacted the company to no avail, so ended up throwing the product away and getting a different pedometer. This thing is a piece of junk, buy something else!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Good luck pairing to ipad 3
customer_reviews.text: Ipad does not recognize this Bluetooth device. Have been trying repeatedly for 24 hours to get them to work together. No luck. May return this device if I can not get it worked out over the weekend. Any brilliant ideas welcome. Edit: amazon sent me a new device and it paired instantly. Now they have updated the software and you can choose between multiple things....myland, challenges, walkathon. It also links with runkeeper and myfitnesspal. Have really enjoyed this purchase since I got it set up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Great motivator for me
customer_reviews.text: This is small enough for me to wear all day, and have it hidden under jackets or shirts. The corresponding app has a game and challenges that make it fun for me. I needed something to gauge how active i was on any given day, and this does the trick. It still has some quirks, for instance the stair counter is inconsistent (with the iPhone 5 app at least). I end up with a stair count for the day, but I cant see it increment as I am doing stairs. Striiv is aware of the issue, and believe they have logged it. This also integrates with MyFitnessPal to input your burned calories.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O

customer_reviews.title: I could deal with it if was easy to reconnect
customer_reviews.text: This could possibly be a 5 star review except a key feature never worked properly. The "app" associated with this device never connected well. It only worked in spurts. I could deal with it if was easy to reconnect. It was not. I had to keep a paper clip handy to do a hard reset every time it decided to go dark. I tried every other tip from their help site. So if you just want an awesome pedometer get this but if you are looking for hands free tracking and all the other goodies look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: andre l williams

customer_reviews.title: What A Dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: This device was not user friendly at all. I kept receiving an Error 4 message when attempting to perform the set up for the device itself. This was very disappointing as I was excited about using this streamlined version of the Striiv brand pedometer. I work in an I.T. function professionally. I am flabbergasted by what appears to be short vision of the creators of this device to not have an option to sync this device for Android products as well. I am an Apple products fan, yet you can't sleep on the advances Samsung is making of which utilizes Android technology. The end result was I returned this product and purchased a Fitbit Flex. Signed, Sad and Dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: Howard Henderson

customer_reviews.title: I like the
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a few years and I think it is not always the most accurate if the sport is something other than walking and running. The screen doesn't display the steps sometiimes until I plug it in but then I probably would be looking at it more during the day if it did. I like the app
customer_reviews.author: Mary McCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This pedometer does the job. I bought it especially to motivate me with the online app that has a game with it and the ability to connect with other Striiv users. There is even a Facebook page for Striiv walkers. I would suggest that a new buyer watch the tutorials as that is a big help to understanding the meter. Other reviewers have criticized the Customer Care but I have found them to be responsive and concerned about my experience. The play is well made. The clip is steel and is very tight. I bought a "leash" at the same time but won't need to use it. This is a quality item. I recommend the Striiv play.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Silvestre

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: Well, at my work we are doing a fitness program where we count our steps throughout the week. 10k steps a day. I had high hopes for this as I was reading all of the reviews. I purchased this, and it would not connect to my computer, or my phone. It wouldnt even RESET. Unfortunately, this product is being sent back. :(
customer_reviews.author: Brandi F.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on this product, I was concerned but I really liked my original Striiv Smart Pedometer, (not this device) that I bought a year ago. I think improvements have been made because I don't have any problems with bluetooth connectivity, ( iPhone) and the battery life seems ok. I probably charge it every 2 or 3 days, not a big deal. So far it works just as I had hoped. No problems recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Striiv Play Wireless Smart Pedometer
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded the Striiv APP first, but I guess I was walking to light. Now, that I have my Pedometer, I love it! I use it, all the time. I have even encourage my Facebook friends to participate, and purchase the Striiv Pedometer, and Phone APP. My daughter and me gets plenty of usage out of the Pedometer.
customer_reviews.author: Tea Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Won't Turn On :(
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to start. I have to guess this is a common problem, as instructions for resetting a device that won't start are prominently featured in the instructions and they even have a video on their website. Have followed all the directions exactly multiple times, and it just won't start. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jadie Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Striiv Play will have you moving :)
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to set up on your iphone. There is a tutorial on line if you need help, I did :) I got one for me and one for my daughter so we could challenge each other. The clip is tight and snug, easy to wear. I wore it for five days before I had to recharge it. I just charge it next to my phone when I go to sleep. It counts every step and even knows when you are climbing stair! amazing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Beck

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked this initially and found that it worked well. Rather quickly it stopped holding a charge and then stopped counting the steps correctly. I bought this as an alternative to the fitbit to save some money. I'm sick of dealing with it and resetting it and emailing the company again and again. Now I've taken the plunge and just bought the fitbit one. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MomofGirls

customer_reviews.title: Recently Got Worse - Bad App
customer_reviews.text: They used to have a decent app called Walkathon. You could challenge people all over the world to races, etc. It was great and worth putting up with having to order and return several of these devices before getting one that works. They have replaced the app with a poor app with limited functionality. Stupid move Striiv.
customer_reviews.author: Good Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great motivator
customer_reviews.text: Even though I had to return the 1st one because it wouldn't stay synced with my phone, this gadget is a fantastic little walking coach. I had recently broken my ankle and was in a lot of pain whenever I walked. This was just the incentive I needed to get moving and redirect my focus from the pain to the various milestones it provides.
customer_reviews.author: KimQ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it. Really. I mean it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it 0 stars. And I wish I had believed the reviews... It never charged up - tried for 5 hours even though the manual asks for 45 minutes. Tried both USB power adapter and my laptop. Tried holding the reset button....tried everything. Maybe this is a nice product when it works but I just don't trust it anymore. Already asked for a refund and will be buying a Fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: KDBC

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to use and a great motivational tool to meet ...
customer_reviews.text: It is fun to use and a great motivational tool to meet or exceed your goals. The deal breaker is its customer service which is non existent. Buying it through Amazon is the only way to do it since its return policy is great. I have owned several but don't even try now to contact Striiv if it malfunctions. It is unlikely I will buy another
customer_reviews.author: Tulip

customer_reviews.title: So far great!
customer_reviews.text: Easily syncs to my IPad to show the data. I use it with the Play app and it works great. Recognized the hills as steps so it can tell change in altitude. It is a nice thumb size that stays where you put it. Update: I wanted more accurate data so I switched to the Garmin Forerunner 10. Love my watch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, small, effective step tracker.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the cheapest, easiest step tracker (calorie's burned counter) to link to My Fitness Pal. This fits the bill. I charge it overnight, wear it on my bra strap from morning to night, and several times a day it updates to My Fitness Pal. It does that well. I don't use it for games.
customer_reviews.author: Peppy

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear.
customer_reviews.text: I got it, followed the directions and it wouldn't even turn on. I tried charging it on the computer, then I tried a wall charger. It would not come on. I returned it and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Ilea H

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Love striive products except they don't last long , this one only lasted a couple of months. Also the game app used to be great but now it is horrible with in app purchases, ads, not fun anymore . Fitbit lasts so much longer
customer_reviews.author: cici

customer_reviews.title: Pay full price so you are insured a new one!
customer_reviews.text: This was at a much lower price than normal, but it said they were new. I think they sent me a rebuilt ones. The first one I got only worked for about a week. Sent it back and the second one worked for about a month, then wouldn't sync with computer. Tried everything suggested by Striiv. Finally just gave up and went back to my Striiv Play which I like better. Only changed because I wanted sync wirelessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was real disappointed since I love my Striiv Smart Pedometer. First one of these would never turn on, even after charging. The replacement would only start after a hard reboot. A couple weeks after that I had to do a hard reboot anytime I wanted to view info on the device. Returned it and got a new Striiv Smart Pedometer. Idea of the Play is cool but I will stick with the original. It works much better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until I accidentally washed it the second time
customer_reviews.text: Finally received one that worked. I loved it until I accidentally washed it the second time. Then it died (so sad).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Striiv Play didn't work, but replacement (different model) works very well.
customer_reviews.text: The device I received did not work. I actually returned it to the company and received a different model. I like my new one and really like the app for the Striiv devices.
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: Terrible directions and the website didn't help at all
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Terrible directions and the website didn't help at all. No customer service to speak of. Just go with one of the more popular, slightly more expensive versions.
customer_reviews.author: Knitgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Received promptly, and promptly was it returned as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly, and promptly was it returned as it was dead on arrival. Was looking forward to a lower cost alternative to a FitBit. Not sure if I'll try a second time or not.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: My daughter got it for me for Christmas - we are both very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It won't take a charge. I have tried several times and have looked online for directions. Others have also had this problem. My daughter got it for me for Christmas - we are both very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: More instructions needed!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pedometer, love it! BUT why are the instructions not complete? It wouldnt start when I recieved it. I followed the instructions - but it wouldnt start. I emailed amazon as well as Striiv. I recieved everything needed from amazon to return it before I recieved an answer from striiv. Lucky I hadnt returned it cause the new instructions WORKED. I am addicted now!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie Adenborg

customer_reviews.title: product good
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of the striiv plays in the last six months. the one I bought for myself has been working great and no complaints. However, the one I bought recently for my son is having issues. It is not counting steps, and I ve tried several times to reset. Striiv's website does not offer any trouble shooting info on it. it is getting very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: kath

customer_reviews.title: It NEVER turned on.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. It NEVER turned on. I tried all the troubleshooting techniques several times. I had it plugged in for at least 4 hours before trying to get it to work. Still nothing. I expected short battery life, but this does not turn on even when plugged in. I could ship it back, but this would cost even more time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Petr Knize

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. A pain to program and we never got it to work properly. Returned it after a week - something that is labeled as "smart" should be easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: ShopTech

customer_reviews.title: LOVED BUT.............
customer_reviews.text: I only had my Striiv for 2 weeks. LOVED it. Yes past tense, the secure clamp was not so secure. I had been wearing it on my bra strap all along which is exactly where it was lost from. I would have given it 4 stars except for this I wish did not have to do this again,:-(.... but will repurchase. PS from those who purchase and it does not work straight away plug it in for a couple of hours and it should then start
customer_reviews.author: Justsayin

customer_reviews.title: HATED IT!
customer_reviews.text: INSTRUCTIONS AND IMAGES DID NOT AGREE WITH ON SCREEN VISUALS. COULD NOT PROGRAM. I TRIED FOR AN HOUR AND THEN MY FRIEND ALSO TRIED FOR ABOUT AN HOUR. IT WAS IMPOSSIBLE SINCE THE BOXES IN THE INSTRUCTIONS ARE NOT VISIBLE ON THE PEDOMETER SCREEN.
customer_reviews.author: petitemiss

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is 3rd Striiv I have owned. Like this one the best with the new app on my iPad easier to read than small self contained first version. Great motivator to get moving with the challenges and additional islands to build.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila C

customer_reviews.title: Not good , broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the striiv play for my dad as he loves tracking his steps. However, would not recommend cause it stopped working properly (not counting steps even after trying to factory reset along with app).
customer_reviews.author: Pgal

customer_reviews.title: Striiv Play Wireless Smart Pedometer
customer_reviews.text: Striiv Play Wireless Smart Pedometer Works great. Keeps up with lots more steps than my phone did by itself and it is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P.

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective
customer_reviews.text: I just bought 3 of these as I love Play when it works. Think it's most accurate. But none worked. All returned. Manufacturer said they were obsolete and battery is dead and can't be charged. :(
customer_reviews.author: denise stefan

customer_reviews.title: Junk...Pass on this.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Can't get to work with a PC or Android. Was NEVER able to sync with an account. Contacted customer support and was disappointed with service. They told me they needed to add my unit to their server. How is that going to help everybody else with the same problems?
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: It is working well and creating a fun way to be motivated. It's metal clip is right so I don't worry about losing it. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: disneynut1966

customer_reviews.title: It's a Love / Hate Relationship
customer_reviews.text: I have really Enjoyed using the Striiv. I downloaded the app to my IPhone and am motivated by my Charts & Stats. I like that I was matched with a team. I don't play My Land but can see how motivating that can be for those who play games. My only complaint is how often I lose connection between my IPhone and my Play.
customer_reviews.author: BethV

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a gift. It won't charge ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift. It won't charge at all so I've never been able to even turn it on. Also they won't replace it since I wasn't the one who bought it. Complete garbage
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Bomberger

customer_reviews.title: Great pedometer
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this pedometer. It works so well with the Striiv app, and I use it every day. It has been a very important part of my recent 25 pound weight loss!
customer_reviews.author: W.Shoe

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: bought this to take all the wear off my iphone this saves a lot of battery because it only syncs with the phone when you want. not great if you like doing all the challenges. overall descent
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Neels

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I waited too long to try this after I bought it and could never get it to work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. A breeze! I love having an effortless way to keep track of "mileage."
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna J King

customer_reviews.title: Broken x2
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product 2 times and both times it arrived and did not function. Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.author: the voice

customer_reviews.title: If you want to feel like you are walking more than you are, then this is for you!!
customer_reviews.text: Was not accurate. I walk stairs everyday and after 4 flights it measured 9 stairs. While driving it would think I was walking and climbing stairs. Turning it on and off before driving and after didn't work because I always forgot. I ended up returning it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Yellams

customer_reviews.title: Batteries dead
customer_reviews.text: The batteries could not be revived after several attempts following company guidelines. Contacted the company and received no response. I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old one that just got worn out over a year! Love the features.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Holloway Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I may be premature with this harsh rating because it is difficult to evaluate something that does not work. I bought it for my son who now must deal with a refund or replacement. Fortunately it was purchased through Amazon which will make that task much easier.
customer_reviews.author: JimMack

customer_reviews.title: ... the second one of these I ordered and just like the first one
customer_reviews.text: this was the second one of these I ordered and just like the first one,simply did not work,Would not charge or turn on
customer_reviews.author: G. L. C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good pedometer
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of trouble getting it to sync with my iphone.....even the software fix didn't fix it all.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E Teel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. Charged for 4 hours. Nothing on screen. Held down reset button, nothing happened. Do not recommend. On its way back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Koutroubas

customer_reviews.title: A life saver!
customer_reviews.text: It is an awesome product, in a convenient little package! Can pair with my fitness pal to track exercise and food.
customer_reviews.author: I.K.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used it for awhile and then had to reset it. It is now unusable!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Buck

customer_reviews.title: Striv
customer_reviews.text: love it, app works great and nice to know how many steps I take everyday. would highly reccomened Striv to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: caryn b. steiner

customer_reviews.title: I love my Striiv!
customer_reviews.text: I had the first generation Striiv pedometer and I just upgraded to the new Striiv Play version that sinks wirelessly to my iPhone. Wow! It is just a fantastic way to keep myself walking and moving everyday! I love the village and incentives, I love the ease of use, I love feeling knowing I did 11,004 steps two days ago! I highly recommend this wonderful, affordable little personal trainer of a gadget!
customer_reviews.author: phyllis fulton

customer_reviews.title: So much for a good replacement!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't think I will be ordering anymore from Amazon. My Sister said she gets a lot from you and she must not have any problems!! I received my SECOND Striiv, This one doesn't work either!! Even when I go to download it on my computer it says this signature of this program is corrupt or invalid!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The pedometer was everything I expected. The design is very nice, it's small and barely noticeable. The app that comes with the product is useful, you can keep track of everything. Overall, very nice product for a very nice prize.
customer_reviews.author: Aisulu Usubalieva

customer_reviews.title: Battery life too short
customer_reviews.text: O ly last half a day then goes dead with my busy lifestyle need a full days battery. I. Bought fitbit instead and the battery last 3 day
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: i had some problems but it was with the app. After they fixed it with the new updates it has been working fine. i really recommend it
customer_reviews.author: YWeiler

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. It just doesn't turn on, and there is no customer service to call. DO NOT BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: C. Huntson

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Drains iPhone battery a bit, but using this pedometer is great motivation to be more active. I've recommended this to friends. Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy I.

customer_reviews.title: Striiv
customer_reviews.text: The greatest I use this every day. It's keeps me moving, since using the product I've reached 10,000 which surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Calame

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is very easy and very accurate. I love how my friends and I compete with one another.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Annpaul

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I expected. Sleek. Fun, and reliable. I have need using it for a few weeks now and have been very happy
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with devices
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, thinking it would work with my iPad2, but it didn't. When I told the company it was silly you could download an app, but not the product for it, rhey were very rude. Amazon was very good though, and took the product back without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Krzyzewski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pedometer
customer_reviews.text: Best pedometer ever. Small and sleek, unnoticeable. Long lasting battery. Love how it syncs to my phone. Use it with the app and have fun completing challenges.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hansen

customer_reviews.title: tho' nice couldn't help
customer_reviews.text: This device will not sync and the Striiv people, tho' nice couldn't help.
customer_reviews.author: M. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Faulty device
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews. First one wouldn't turn on so I returned and repurchased. 2nd one wouldn't turn on either. The manufacturer will replace for "free" but makes you pay return shipping. No way am I paying return shipping on a faulty product that is unfair. I'm sad I can't use the game app now but at least my new Fitbit operates correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Alana M. Deranek

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a striiv play and it won't start up. I tried waking it up with a paper clip as the instructions suggested...still no luck. I returned the unit and requested a refund from Amazon. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Kuniyoshi

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: If you want to spend unlimited time resetting a "stuck" or "dead" device than by all means buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G

customer_reviews.title: Strive delivers
customer_reviews.text: This device does everything expected. Perfect. I use it with my Fitness Pal and love the way it interfaces and updates my progress.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Hall

customer_reviews.title: ... half a day and it shuts off its been horrible since day 1 and has never gotten better
customer_reviews.text: Battery life half a day and it shuts off its been horrible since day 1 and has never gotten better .Do yourself a favor and buy a Fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: nelia n.

customer_reviews.title: Great activity monitor
customer_reviews.text: Step count is accurate. Easy to use. Altimeter information is really useful. As good as my fitbit flex. Long battery life. Bright screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jean McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: DOA, won't charge. This was supposed to be a birthday present for my 9-year-old son so he could compete against me. We are returning it. We will try one more time, and if that one doesn't work, we will switch to another company.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Works with Iphone 4S and up
customer_reviews.text: I would assume that the product works fine, but do not work with iphone 4 also there is no pc software.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Palacios

customer_reviews.title: love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I started counting steps using My Fitness Pal and Striiv, using my iPhone. But the battery drain was amazing. Amazingly bad. So a couple of my friends and I got these little step counters. So cool! No more dead phone. Since the last big upgrade, this device is much better at conserving power as well. I recharge about every three-fours days now. Easy to use, practically invisible, love the cute stars and fireworks display when you hit some goals. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great ! use it all the time !!
customer_reviews.text: Striiv Play has not been out very long and has made great improvement in its code and application that runs on your iPhone 4s and above since it has been released. Support has been very good and getting things right. The batter life has been greatly improved with the newer code and the communication with the app on the iPhone 4S and above has also been greatly improved. This was a great Buy and I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: rmacbeth

customer_reviews.title: Good idea - poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. But device works poorly. Mine never counted stairs. Drains phone battery and locked up 10 days after it arrived. The step counter, calorie burned, distance walked worked well. Challenges are great. But focus on making the device work as advertised is a real must. Totally disappointed with customer support help - almost non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Howard

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first one as it did not work. Once I figured it out, I was very happy with the unit. Sync's nicely with iphone. Has some some other features that I still have not figured out like making friends to challenge. The system automatically keep track of daily activity wihout having to reset it each day. The only problem is that they do not have a long life. I am on my 4th one but starting to think about making a change.
customer_reviews.author: David Penchansky

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a christmas present for my mother to help with her exercise routine. I was embarrassed that it never worked. My mother charged it and followed all directions. She is very computer savy, but was unable to get it to work at all. I returned it, and will be getting her a garmin GPS watch instead.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Poling

customer_reviews.title: Be ware of the battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product for the accuracy and its features. I enjoyed the pedometer. I like the features where I can track the number of stairs I climbed. The only but significant draw back was the battery charge did not last more than a day. I returned the product because of the battery problem. If someone does not mind charging it every day this a great product.
customer_reviews.author: naveen maddineni

customer_reviews.title: Small and useable.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Striv Play daily like a wristwatch on my belt, even when traveling. It is not obtrusive and an excellent reminder of my need to stay active all day. It's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Stabbert

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I will never know if the Striiv was worth my money as it was broken upon arrival. I have since returned this device for a Fitbit One. The Fitbit is amazing and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Sucker
customer_reviews.text: Will not hold a 'full charge' or respond to commands. I knew I would be in trouble when I opened the Amazon box and only found this item...no customer receipt, no return forms.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the produce back because it didn't work. The second one they sent also did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Murphy

product_meta.title: Striiv STRV01-002-0C Play Wireless Tracker
product_meta.description:
Between work and family, it's hard to fit exercise into a busy schedule. Striiv Play is is the next generation Smart Pedometer; one that turns fitness into Play -- making it easy to be more active, lose weight, and step into a healthier lifestyle. Striiv goes beyond numbers and charts. It links via Bluetooth 4.0 to your iPhone 4s/5 to compete with friends and family, hit personalized goals, or play games powered by walking. It provides instant feedback on steps, stairs, calories burned, and your milestones with a large high resolution OLED screen. 

 Basic Trouble shooting steps 
The device needs to be charged for at least 30 minutes before using it.Please make sure the cable is plug in completely. The screen will not be on when the device is charging. It means that there is no light or sign on the screen that shows the device is charging. The screen should be black. Once the device is charged, turn it on by pressing the Scoll Button. If the screen is not turning on, perform a Reset by inserting a paper clip into the Reset Button. Press on the Scoll Button and the screen should be on. Then unplug the USB cable. The Reset Button is next to the Charging Port. The Scoll Button is at the front of the device. The steps are listed in the Quick Start Guide. See the attachment. For the customers future queries, please send an email to customercare@striiv.com 



AMAZON.COM
 Striiv Play V3 

Too busy for the gym? Striiv gets you fit and turns fitness into “Play”, even on your busiest days. While other devices only track what you do, Striiv takes activities you enjoy, like competing with friends and playing games on your phone, and turns fitness fun into real results. The majority of Striiv users lose weight - over 13lbs on average. Ditch the graphs, and join the fun!

Striiv has been featured in the New York Times, USA Today, CNN, and People. Try the product that has everyone walking A LOT MORE! 

*Based on 2012 Striiv sourced user survey

PLAY HARD. GET FIT.
View larger 

GET FIT WITH FRIENDS
 Did you know that one of the best ways to get fit is with your friends? (in fact, having just one friend on Striiv will get you to walk an average of half a mile more). Play and compete with your friends and family, and see how you stack up to their daily average and personal best. The Striiv iPhone App makes it easy to link friends on Facebook, email, or text message. Game on!

View larger 

TRY STRIIV FOR FREE
 Have friends that don’t have a Play? Are you considering other trackers? No problem! Download the free Striiv app (striiv.com/free) on your iPhone or iPod Touch today, and you can link your Striiv Play device at anytime. 

View larger 

GAMES POWERED BY ACTIVITY
 The concept is simple -- play addictively fun games powered by walking and you will get fit. Imagine taking your favorite games on the iPhone and combining them with your real world activity. Don’t be surprised when you find yourself walking up and down the stairs at 3 am trying to earn extra points!

View larger 
PREMIUM FEATURES
 Striiv Play is packed with premium features like counting stairs with a high-precision altimeter, a high-resolution, ultra bright OLED display, and a soft-polished stainless steel clip for maximum comfort and durability. In addition, the Play is water-resistant to prevent damage when working up a sweat. The Play also features a large high-resolution OLED screen that displays your stats clearly -- even under sunlight. 

View larger 

SEE YOUR RESULTS. GET MOTIVATED.
 Striiv tracks your steps, stairs, calories burned, distance, and minutes of activity. Achieve your weight loss goals and watch as you “Play” the pounds off with the built-in weight tracker.

View larger 

COUNT CALORIES WITH MYFITNESSPAL™
We've partnered with MyFitnessPal, the largest free online health community, so you can track your diet and nutrition along with your activity. MyFitnessPal allows you to track what you eat to meet your daily calorie goal and features the largest food database with over 2 million foods. Striiv Play links seamlessly to your MyFitnessPal account so you can see how much of that milkshake you’ve walked off.

View larger 





HIGH ACCURACY
 In addition to the 3-D motion sensor and high precision altimeter, Striiv's anti-cheating algorithms provide an additional layer of accuracy. Other trackers report up to thousands of "fake steps" from car vibrations or random movements each day, but Striiv's proprietary TruMotion(TM) technology detects and filters them out to provide the best accuracy in the toughest real world conditions. 


 *Results are from a survey study conducted by Striiv in April 2012. 

 WHAT YOU GET 
 * Striiv Play Smart Pedometer 
 * Micro-USB 2.0 Cable 
 * Quick start guide 
 * Free Striiv iPhone application

 COMPATIBILITY 
 * iPhone 4s 
 *  iPhone 5 
 * iPod Touch (5th generation) 
 * The New iPad 
 * iPad Mini
feature_bullets: Take Control of your Fitness with the Strive Play Wireless Tracker monitors every step and Stair you take connects via Bluetooth to iPhone and Android devices plus PC and Mac
Design that delivers high availability, scalability, and for maximum flexibility and price/performance
Links wirelessly via Bluetooth 4.0 to your iPhone 4s and 5, new iPad, iPad Mini, or iPod Touch (5th gen)
Turn fitness into Play: Addictive games based on movement and competitions with friends and family, see rankings and progress in real time.
Invite friends via Facebook, Email, and SMS text messages and challenge them to beat your personal best.
Materials and Construction: Unified Polycarbonate face with integrated Manganese belt clip
Best real-world accuracy with 3-D accelerometer, high precision altimeter, and filters to avoid "fake" steps common in other pedometers (e.g. driving, random motion)
Bright OLED displays milestone progress, steps, stairs, calories burned, distance, and minutes of activity (visible even in bright sunlight)
